node.title: Eight years of dominance not only makes Mercedes the greatest F1 team ever, they are the best in sports history
node.alt: Two men, arm in arm, raise their arms in celebration.
node.description: Mercedes have been the pinnacle of Formula 1 for eight years and it is now time we recognise them as the greatest team in sports, writes Michael Doyle.Â
node.content:
["Forget the drama of the final race of the 2021 Formula 1 season if you can.\u00a0", "Never mind if you believed Lewis Hamilton was robbed of the title or not.", "Now is an opportunity to reflect on an era of dominance we have witnessed from Mercedes.\u00a0", "Since 2014, F1 has followed the same engine regulations known as the Turbo-Hybrid era.", "The regulations will change in 2022 and a new era will dawn for the sport, but sports lovers should not forget what they have witnessed in the past eight years.", "Sport is full of historically great teams and dynasties.", "The Chicago Bulls of the 1990s ruled basketball, like the West Indies test cricket team in the 1980s.", "Manchester United from 1998 to 2001 may be the greatest club football side ever put together, and the All Blacks from 2008-2015 redefined excellence in the sport.", "And while the debate about the 'greatest sports team ever' will never have a conclusion, I put to you that no sports team has been more impressive than the 2014-2021 Mercedes-AMG Petronas F1 Team.", "In the Turbo-Hybrid era, there have been eight drivers' championships and eight constructors' championships.", "That is 16 world championship trophies up for grabs and Mercedes won 15 of them.", "During the first three years of the era, Mercedes were at times laughably better than their competition.", "", "
Lewis Hamilton and Nico Rosberg started the era of Mercedes dominance.(Reuters:\u00a0Maxim Shemetov)
", "Race after race, country after country, either the Lewis Hamilton or Nico Rosberg seemingly guided their silver car to victory \u2014 their only real competition being each other.", "At the end of 2016, after winning his one and only drivers' championship, Nico Rosberg retired and Valtteri Bottas took his place.", "Unlike the Bulls losing Michael Jordan to baseball, Mercedes losing the reigning world champion to retirement didn't stop them from winning.", "The grand prix wins kept coming as the team drew up new plans for the builder as their trophy cabinet needed to grow.", "", "
Valtteri Bottas ensured Mercedes won five more constructors' championships after Rosberg's retirement.(Getty Images: Mark Thompson)
", "And then the 2018 season came and finally Mercedes had a challenger, Ferrari.", "Led by four-time champion Sebastian Vettel the famous Italian outfit was going to knock Mercedes from their throne.", "Ferrari seemingly had a faster car, their engine was just as powerful and they had a driver as good as, or even better than, Hamilton.", "Ferrari was going to reign supreme in Formula 1 again.", "Someone didn't tell Mercedes.", "The silver arrows didn't get complacent after four years of dominance. They didn't throw in the towel when all looked lost mid-way through 2018.", "They regrouped and unleashed a tsunami of excellence which simply overwhelmed the competition.", "From mid-2018 to 2020, Mercedes were arguably at their peak.", "Lewis Hamilton never looked like losing the drivers' championship and Mercedes were on another lever in the constructors' race.", "Ferrari, Renault and Honda tried to make an engine as good as Mercedes \u2014 they couldn't.", "McLaren, Red Bull and Williams tried to make a car as good as Mercedes \u2014 they couldn't.", "Racing Point (now Aston Martin) figured it would just be easier to copy.", "In the most competitive and ego-driven four-wheeled motorsport in the world, Mercedes was the best and seemingly enjoyed beating some of racing's greatest teams into submission.", "And that is what makes this team so great.", "Led by Toto Wolff and spearheaded by Hamilton, the greatest driver of his generation, Mercedes had a will to win which is greater than any sporting team there has been.", "They celebrated race wins in 2020 as boisterously as they celebrated in 2014 when they finally broke through to win their first title.", "Winning was an addiction. They couldn't get enough of it and they never ever got tired of it.", "Then we got 2021 \u2014 the tightest and most competitive season in the history of the sport.", "Mercedes finally had a worthy opponent who was going to fight until the bitter end \u2014 and boy was it bitter.", "", "
Lewis Hamilton congratulates Max Verstappen after the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix.(Getty Images: Lars Baron)
", "In July, Max Verstappen held a 32-point lead over Hamilton in the drivers' championship.", "With four races left in the season, Verstappen led by 19 points.", "But Hamilton and Mercedes never quit. They embraced the challenge. They seemed to thrive on it.", "It was almost as if they had been waiting eight years for the opportunity for someone to go toe-to-toe with them for a full season.", "They got their challenge at the end of the era and they were up to it.", "They won the constructors' championship, their eighth in a row, and they lost the drivers' title by 2.2 seconds.\u00a0", "And don't forget, only a safety car brought Verstappen back into that race in Abu Dhabi.\u00a0", "Eight years of near-perfection, with only misfortune out of their control denying them a clean sweep of the F1 titles in the full era of the sport.\u00a0", "This is domination you can only marvel at, and in my estimation, is the greatest sporting dynasty ever assembled.\u00a0", "Long\u00a0live Mercedes, the greatest sports\u00a0team in history."]
